response.overview: “Intro [Draco Ignis]“ “King Of Rock And Roll” (Dio/Appice/Bain/Campbell) “Time To Burn” (Dio/Goldy) “The Last In Line” (Dio/Bain/Campbell) “Holy Diver” (Dio) “The Last In Line (reprise)” (Dio/Bain/Campbell) “Heaven And Hell” (Dio/Iommi/Butler/Ward) “Sacred Heart” (Dio/Appice/Bain/Campbell) “Rock ‘N’ Roll Children” (Dio) “Long Live Rock ‘N’ Roll” (Dio/Blackmore) “Man On The Silver Mountain” (Dio/Blackmore) “Rock ‘N’ Roll Children (reprise)” (Dio) “Rainbow In The Dark” (Dio/Bain/Appice/Campbell) “Hungry For Heaven” (Dio/Bain)
